Uses of Interface
net.aifusion.metamodel.Repository

  • Packages that use Repository 
    Package Description
    net.aifusion.cimserver
    This package contains an implementation of a CIM Client and CIM Server based on a lightweight HTTP server.
    net.aifusion.cql
    This package implements a query facility based on the DMTF CIM Query Language (CQL).
    net.aifusion.metamodel
    This package contains the basic implementation classes needed for the CIM metamodel, as well as a MOF parser.
    net.aifusion.providers
    This package contains the API used by all CIM providers, and the implementation of a basic in-memory provider.
    net.aifusion.utils
    This package contains a number of tools, and a dispatcher for them.

      class  CimClient
      Class to implement the client side interface for a Cim Server.

    • Uses of Repository in net.aifusion.metamodel

      Classes in net.aifusion.metamodel that implement Repository 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BufferedCache
      Class to implement a simple in-memory buffer backed by a repository for parsing messages.
      class  InMemoryCache
      In-memory repository supporting multiple namespaces, but no persistence
      class  InMemoryRepository
      Simple in-memory cache for model objects.
      class  PersistentCache
      Class to implement a persistent repository that supports multiple name spaces
      Methods in net.aifusion.metamodel that return Repository 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Repository BufferedCache.getBackingStore()
      Get the backing store for this repository
      Repository MOFParser.getRepository()  
      Repository Parser.getRepository()
      Get the repository being used by the parser
      Constructors in net.aifusion.metamodel with parameters of type Repository 
      Constructor Description
      BufferedCache​(Repository backingStore)
      Create a repository buffer with a backing store for additional definitions.
      MOFParser​(Repository repository)
      Create a MOF Parser with the given repository
